hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: UI_branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Enter the name of the UI branch

flow-definition.script:
// Manually pulled from git based on configurations pipeline { agent { node { label 'build_slave' } } environment { BUILD_NAME = "DMAP Binary Build" NOTIFYUSERS = 'abhayj@newtglobalcorp.com' BUILD_DETAILS = "
Job Name: ${env.JOB_NAME}
Build Number: ${env.BUILD_NUMBER}
Build URL: ${BUILD_URL}" } tools { nodejs "nodejs" } parameters { string(name: 'UI_branch', defaultValue: 'Developer', description: 'Enter the name of the UI branch') } options { timestamps() timeout(time: 12, unit: 'HOURS') buildDiscarder(logRotator(numToKeepStr: '10')) } stages { stage ("Checkout Code") { steps { deleteDir() dir("UI"){ deleteDir() echo "Checkout the UI code" //git branch: "${params.UI_branch}", credentialsId: 'Kavya_1709', url: 'https://github.com/newtglobalgit/DMAPP.git' withCredentials([usernamePassword(credentialsId: 'Kavya_1709', usernameVariable: 'GIT_USERNAME', passwordVariable: 'GIT_PASSWORD')]) { sh """ git clone --depth 5 -b ${params.UI_branch} https://${GIT_USERNAME}:${GIT_PASSWORD}@github.com/newtglobalgit/DMAPP.git . """ } } } } stage ("Backend Build") { steps { dir("UI"){ echo "Building the UI code" sh "npm install" sh "ng build --configuration production --base-href=/DMAP/" dir("dist"){ sh "tar -cvf DMAP.tar DMAP/" sh "cp DMAP.tar ../.." } } } } } post { always { emailext attachmentsPattern: 'Backend/Tests/htmlcov/ConstructTestCoverageReport.html, Backend/Tests/ConstructTestOutput.html, Backend/PythonBanditAnalysisReport.html, Backend/SonarQube/BackendSonarQualityGateCheck.html,UI/UISnykReport.html,Backend/SonarQube/Frontend_Sonar_Issues.xlsx,Backend/SonarQube/Backend_Sonar_Issues.xlsx', subject: "Jenkins Job Report For ${BUILD_NAME} - ${currentBuild.currentResult}", body: "BUILD DETAILS: ${BUILD_DETAILS}
BUILD STATUS: ${currentBuild.currentResult}", to: "${NOTIFYUSERS}" } }}
